myProfile.title: My profile
myProfile.emailChangeExpiredAlertTitle: We couldn't change your account's email.
myProfile.emailChangeExpiredAlertText: New emails must be verified within 7 days of the update. Your account's current email is still {email}.

validation.fieldRequired: {field, select, firstName {First name} lastName {Last name} other {This field} } is required

modal.title: Update your email
modal.tosAgreement: I've read and understood these terms.
modal.updateEmailFormNote: What will happen after changing the email address?
modal.updateEmailChanges:
• As the owner of the new email address, you will grant full access to the new email address's owner to all of the information on the "My Elementor" dashboard and the support conversations history.
  • The old email account will no longer receive system reminders and notices. those will be redirected to new email address.
  • You must validate your new email address by confirming the validation email.
  • You won't have access to your account with the former email address once the validation process is completed.
modal.updateEmailToS:
• I am the owner of the new email address (according to Elementor's T&C's)
  • I am the owner of this Elementor account and request to change the account's email address.

success.emailChangeSuccessText: We sent a verification email to <strongText>{email}</strongText>.<break/> It might take a few minutes for it to appear, or check your spam folder.
success.updateEmailNextSteps:
• Go to your inbox and verify your new email. Once you're done you'll be able to use the new email address.
  • The email update will be canceled if you don't verify the new email within 7 days.
  • Did you sign up with your social media account? You might need to update your password.

validation.fieldRequired: {field, select, email {New email} emailConfirmation {Confirm new email} other {This field} } is required
validation.emailsDontMatch: These email addresses donâ€™t match. Try again.

validation.fieldRequired: {field, select, oldPassword {Current password} newPassword {New password} confirmPassword {Confirm new password} other {This field} } is required
validation.userPasswordRule: Password must be at least eight characters long and contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase, one digit and one special character.
validation.oldAsNewPassword: New password must be different from the current password
